oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Charter Commission Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chairman of the Charter Commission, Ross H. Hicks, and subcommittee chairpersons held regular meetings between January and November 1980. Topics discussed include final reports from each subcommittee and the precise language of the Proposed Charter. In addition to Charter Commission meetings, the Commission held four public hearings to discuss the language and provisions included in the Proposed Charter. Included here is a transcript from the October 23, 1980 public hearing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Meetings; Committees
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
